data.comment: The big names in today's match at Yankee Stadium have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Throw-in New York City.
Throw-in for Montreal at Yankee Stadium.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 4, New York City have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
New York City drives forward and Maxi Moralez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to New York City.
In the minute 7, Montreal's Amar Sejdic gets in a shot on goal at Yankee Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
New York City are caught offside.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
In the minute 11, At Yankee Stadium, Montreal are penalized for being offside.
Ramy Touchan awards Montreal a goal kick.
In Bronx, New York City push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 16, New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
In Bronx New York City drive forward through Gary Mackay Steven. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 18, New York City have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
New York City are whistled for offside.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 24, Montreal have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 29, Jesus Medina for New York City drives towards goal at Yankee Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to New York City.
Jesus Medina (New York City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 30, New York City have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
New York City push upfield but Ramy Touchan quickly pulls them for offside.
Romell Quioto gets his shot on target but fails to score for Montreal.
In the minute 32, In Bronx a free kick has been awarded the away team.
New York City's Gary Mackay Steven gets in a shot on goal at Yankee Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Montreal advance rapidly upfield but Ramy Touchan blows for offside.
In the minute 36, Ramy Touchan awards the home team a throw-in.
New York City drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Ramy Touchan signals a throw-in for Montreal, close to New York City's area.
In the minute 38, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Montreal.
Montreal are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
In the minute 40, New York City have a goal kick.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
At Yankee Stadium, New York City are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 42, New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Montreal in their own half.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Free kick New York City.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Bronx, New York City push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
At Yankee Stadium the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Montreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first-half is over at Yankee Stadium.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Throw-in New York City.
New York City advance rapidly upfield but Ramy Touchan blows for offside.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Montreal.
Montreal push upfield but Ramy Touchan quickly pulls them for offside.
Montreal to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Montreal in the half of New York City.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
Montreal are whistled for offside.
In the minute 51, Ramy Touchan awards the home team a throw-in.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
Throw-in for Montreal at Yankee Stadium.
In the minute 54, Montreal drive upfield and Romell Quioto gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a New York City defender.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
In the minute 56, Throw-in for New York City in the half of Montreal.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Ramy Touchan signals a Montreal throw-in in New York City's half.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in Bronx.
New York City are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Montreal.
In the minute 59, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
Free kick for Montreal in the half of New York City.
In the minute 61, Romell Quioto of Montreal smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
In the minute 62, Montreal push upfield but Ramy Touchan quickly pulls them for offside.
New York City pushes forward through Maxi Moralez, whose finish on goal is saved.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to New York City.
Romell Quioto of Montreal gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ramy Touchan awards New York City a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Ramy Touchan signals a New York City throw-in in Montreal's half.
Ronald Matarrita gets his shot on target but fails to score for New York City.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Montreal have a goal kick.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jesus Medina is on target to give New York City a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 68, Ronald Matarrita with an assist there.
Anton Tinnerholm (New York City) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Montreal close to the penalty box.
In the minute 70, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bronx.
Throw-in for Montreal in the half of New York City.
In the minute 72, Montreal make their first substitution with Maximiliano Urruti replacing Rudy Camacho.
Ballou Tabla is replacing Bojan Krkic for the away team.
Goal kick for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
In the minute 73, At Yankee Stadium, New York City are penalized for being offside.
In Bronx a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Montreal's Ballou Tabla gets in a shot but it is blocked by a New York City defender.
In the minute 76, Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
Montreal to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
Free kick New York City.
In the minute 78, The home team replace Gary Mackay Steven with Tony Rocha.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
In Bronx Montreal drive forward through Maximiliano Urruti. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 80, Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 81, Throw-in Montreal.
Montreal to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
Mason Toye is on a sub for Amar Sejdic for Montreal.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 83, Ramy Touchan awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal! New York City extend their lead to 2-0 through Maxi Moralez.
That's a fine assist from Anton Tinnerholm.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Maxi Moralez for New York City drives towards goal at Yankee Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to New York City.
Goal! Tony Rocha extends New York City's lead to 3-0.
Great play from Ronald Matarrita to set up the goal.
In Bronx a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 88, Ronald Matarrita for New York City has been booked by Ramy Touchan and receives a first yellow card.
Romell Quioto puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 3-1.
In the minute 89, Jorge Luis Corrales instrumental with a fine assist.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to New York City.
In Bronx New York City drive forward through Maxi Moralez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to New York City.
Ramy Touchan awards Montreal a goal kick.
Ramy Touchan will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
The home team have replaced Ronald Matarrita with Juan Torres. This is the second substitution made today by Ronny Deila.
Ronny Deila (New York City) is making a third substitution, with Nicolas Acevedo replacing Keaton Parks.
